requestParams.name: meta
requestParams.description:

meta= {
"id" : 1,
"title" : "xxx",
"content" : "yyyy",
"biz_sys_Id" : 12232,
"biz_sys_task_type" : 1212,
"start_time" : 1380173565480,
"end_time" : 1380173565480,
"sender_uid" : 213123213,
"sender_nick" : "tbtest1063",
"reminder_flag" : 1,
"finish_strategy" : 1
}
